title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Go CLI and server that lets you pull, create, and run large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage local models from Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus Docker Compose examples for quick local setup.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-py
summary: Minimal Python template showing RAG with Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider and facade for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from Artisan.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde types.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and provides both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Cross-platform desktop UI (Tauri + React) that works with both Ollama and GPT4All backends.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside notes and generate text with Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and development shells with CUDA support.

title: ollama-rag-elastic
summary: End-to-end RAG example using Ollama embeddings and Elasticsearch vector store with FastAPI.
